document.title: WEL_CHECKBOX
document.paragraph:
A WEL_CHECK_BOX control can take two states, checked or unchecked.
2Appearance A WEL_CHECK_BOX
images/wel_check_box_unchecked.png wel_check_box_unchecked
A checked WEL_CHECK_BOX
images/wel_check_box_checked.png wel_check_box_checked
See also
